resources.string: Enables or disables WiFi on tag detection
Enables or disables Bluetooth on tag detection
Enables or disables the Airplane Mode on tag detection
Sets the ringer to normal or silent mode on tag detection
Enables the Alarm on tag detection
Sets a time for the Alarm
